org.crosswire.bibledesktop.desktop
类 Splash

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              javax.swing.JWindow
                  org.crosswire.bibledesktop.desktop.Splash
所有已实现的接口：
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer
public class Splash
extends javax.swing.JWindow

A Simple splash screen.

so start one of these call: 

 Splash s = new Splash();
 ... // init code
 s.close();

作者：
Joe Walker [joe at eireneh dot com]
